summary: An Ordinance providing for the organization of the Department of Buildings of the City of Seattle, authorizing the Superintendent of Buildings to appoint certain employees and fixing the salaries thereof, and repealing Ordinance No. 18589, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the organization of the Department of Buildings of the City of Seattle, authorizing the Superintendent of Buildings to appoint certain employees and prescribing their duties, and fixing the salaries of such employees", approved June 13, 1908.
